trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_00<tab>The glee in Anogg's eyes at the sight of 2P's awakening could only be born of keen self-interest. It would not be wise to keep her waiting.

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_01<tab>Sparing but the barest explanation of affairs for the now functional 2P, Anogg immediately solicits the android's help in using the key, which she does all too readily. The ground begins to tremble, and you rush outside to find the village relentlessly bombarded by a number of unknown craft. However, that is far from the only unpleasant surprise, as you soon learn it was 2P herself who brought about the attack, betraying you and your dwarven companions. With your entire party taken off guard by this news, Anogg comes within a hair's breadth of a dire fate at 2P's hands, but thankfully is rescued by a black-garbed android identifying herself as “2B.” Though your faith in androids may not be at its strongest, you have little choice but to ally yourself with 2B as you pursue the nefarious white-garbed group.
※The Puppets' Bunker can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_02<tab>You find that the white-garbed androids have fled deep underground, to a strange facility rife with even more technological marvels than the Copied Factory. Many such machines are controlled by hostile androids, and you bring down one after another until you are at last able to confront 2P─or what she has become. Though the agglomeration of what you can only assume to be semi-formed androids will likely haunt your nightmares for years to come, you win the battle...however, with so many mysteries unsolved, it is clear that the war is not yet over.

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_03<tab>Having witnessed the reality of the hostile androids' capabilities, Anogg laments her own role in abetting 2P's plans. 2B cuts in, however, claiming responsibility for the catastrophe─and thanks to some well-placed questions from Konogg, you finally obtain a few useful answers about the androids and machine lifeforms. According to 2B, the androids are from another world entirely, and the machine lifeforms are invaders even there. She also believes that the white-garbed androids were created by the machines to fight the original, black-garbed androids as part of their ongoing conflict. What any of this means for the First is difficult to ascertain, but it seems that as the enemy of your enemy, 2B can be considered a friend for now─in which case, the android boy with whom you previously clashed in the Copied Factory may well be too.

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_04<tab>Having offered to take 2B to see her presumed ally, Konogg escorts you to where he and Anogg keep the inert android. Perhaps unsurprisingly, Anogg has appropriated yet another part of the excavation tunnels─where, you recall, the siblings weren't ever meant to set foot─and this semi-secret location is where 9S may be found.

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_05<tab>Upon setting eyes on 9S, 2B confirms that he is indeed her comrade, and that his assistance is indispensable if you are to prevail over the machine lifeforms and their own androids. Though Konogg expects that it will be possible to repair 9S in the same fashion you did 2P, he is also sensitive to his sister's considerable distress, and suggests that all might benefit from a brief respite.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_TODO_00<tab>Enter the Puppets' Bunker.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Anogg.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Konogg.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_TODO_03<tab>Speak with 2B in Anogg's lair.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_000<tab>...Restore...the... What was I saying...?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_001<tab>Mwahahaha! Sweet success!
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_002<tab>Let's not waste any more time about it─2P, do you remember what happened?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_050<tab>I hope that the part replacement won't result in memory loss. We have too many unanswered questions.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_055<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_POD_000_060<tab>Repair process complete.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_070<tab>I... I was damaged in combat, and you brought me here.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_071<tab>And then you wildly inconvenienced us by dying on the table, yes.

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_072<tab>Fortunately for you, we were clever enough to pick up Pod here! And by the fact that we're having this conversation, I assume it's succeeded in repairing the damage.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_073<tab>I see... Did you locate the key as I instructed?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_074<tab>Hmph. Despite how little information we had to go on, we did.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_075<tab>It's fully operational, as far as we can tell, so...can you use it?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_076<tab>Wha─ An earthquake!? Everyone, outside! Now!
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_077<tab>The mountain! What happened to the mountain!?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_078<tab>This isn't─
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_079<tab>Anogg, look!
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_080<tab>2P, no! There are too many!
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_081<tab>Worried for me? Don't be.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_082<tab>What is the meaning of this!?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_083<tab>It means that your assistance is no longer necessary.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_084<tab>Have it your way, then. See this world to its end.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_085<tab>I know I worried, but... I thought she was our friend!
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_086<tab>(-Android in Black-)And who are you?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_A1_000_001<tab>You first.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_A1_000_002<tab>Is your dress about to turn white? Because if so...
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_088<tab>I am a YoRHa No.2 Type B unit─but you may call me 2B. I'm here to destroy the androids in white.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_089<tab>We can discuss this later. Right now, we've got to stop 2P!
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_090<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_VILLAGERA03953_000_125<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_VILLAGERA03953_000_130<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_VILLAGERA03953_000_135<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_140<tab>We've made a fine mess of things, to be sure. But it's hardly the first time. Nothing for it but to fix it.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_145<tab>What have I done...
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_150<tab>Careful. They may intend for us to follow.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_POD_000_155<tab>Alert: Massive energy signature detected.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_250<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_255<tab>All clear. For now.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_260<tab>2P and 2B are identical. How did they come to be on different sides?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_270<tab>I was wrong. So, <var 1A 02 /var>so<var 1A 01 /var> wrong! I made you go along with my decisions... I put everyone in danger...
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_271<tab>Anogg...
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_272<tab>I'm the one who let the conflict spread this far. Blaming yourselves is unnecessary.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_273<tab>Forgive me, but you seem so similar to 2P, and we still don't really understand either of you. Are you truly our ally?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_274<tab>I can't be certain. All I know is that I was damaged in a battle with the machine lifeforms, and then I was here.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_275<tab>Your world is very...different from where I was. I don't know my coordinates, and I can't contact Command─I just followed the explosions.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_276<tab>Let's approach this from a different angle, then. What are the machine lifeforms, and why were you fighting them?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_277<tab>The machine lifeforms are weapons created by aliens from beyond the stars. As part of YoRHa, my mission is to reclaim the planet from these invaders.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_278<tab>Alien...invaders...? Never mind. What about 2P? As an android, does she not belong to this “YoRHa” as well?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_279<tab>No. She is a copy, built by the machine lifeforms─probably to fight YoRHa specifically.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_280<tab>We also retrieved another android─a boy.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_281<tab>If he's still with you, I would like to see him.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_282<tab>Very well. Can't make things any worse.

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SYSTEM_000_283<tab>A new section has been added to the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Portable Archive<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Fill it by using the device to record data at promising spots within the Puppets' Bunker!
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_305<tab>To think he was on our side after all...
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_POD_000_310<tab>Accessing data for YoRHa Type-B unit... Overwrite previous owner ID?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_320<tab>We hid him where 2P wouldn't know to look. Follow me.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_350<tab>He's been out of operation since we brought him here.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_355<tab>...
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SYSTEM_000_360<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_371<tab>My duty is to annihilate the machine lifeforms. For that, I require the assistance of 9S.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_372<tab>We must revive him.
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_373<tab>Fortunately, we have some experience with this sort of thing. What do you say, Anogg?
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_374<tab>I don't... I...

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_375<tab>Er, I'm certain <var 1A 02 /var>everyone<var 1A 01 /var> could use a rest before we proceed. A lot has happened, and we should take time to think things through.
